title: UNFAIR! Losing LP in ranked due to AFK players! Riot fix this and strengthen the penalty on afk play
body:
Hi, this has happened to me for the second time!
I feel like I'm never going to get out of bronze because in heaps of games I have experienced players leaving for no reason, giving the the disadvantage of having 4 players vs 5. 
I've lost LP because of others, like last game we were doing fine until a Ziggs just left
Riot needs to stop the massive loss of LP and strengthen the penalties to AFK players

replies.body:
As annoying as this issue is, what is the solution? 

Penalizing somebody who gets disconnected from the game(not necessarily their fault, may have been a blackout for example), seems very harsh. Repeat offenders are penalized which I think is fair.

On the other side not losing the lp for the loss would result in people deliberately afking when they thought they were going to lose causing another problem.


Only thing I would suggest is if a team does manage to win the 4v5 match their should be a bonus for that (which Riot can correct me if I'm wrong, but I don't think there is).
What if the team with the disadvantage loses, they lose less LP than they normally would. The player who disconnects just loses normal amount.

Nothing will happen, even if the stupid automated punishment system picks it up, the guy will just take 10 sec to create a new account and troll again!

Stop playing this game, tell everyone not to play it!

Then maybe, just maybe Riot will listen when they start losing money and player base!
totally agree with this. can't stand losing rank due to afkers. make the penalties harder.
or, just enjoy the times there is an AFK on the other team and have a smile and a coke.

lol strengthen the penalty on a system that is busted that penalizes people who are not afk and are in game lmao your the reason they used this leavebusters system in the first place and it doesn't work
